SEARCH
Package com.pomodorotimer.pomodorotimer

Class StronglyConnectedComponents

java.lang.Object
com.pomodorotimer.pomodorotimer.StronglyConnectedComponents
public class StronglyConnectedComponents extends Object
Strongly Connected Components (SCC) implementation using Kosaraju's algorithm. Used for network cluster analysis in directed graphs.

Use-case: Network cluster analysis tool where we need to identify groups of nodes that are mutually reachable in a directed graph.

Time Complexity: O(V + E) where V is vertices and E is edges

Space Complexity: O(V + E)

Version:
1.0
Author:
Data Structures Project Team
